name: Razboaiele Oscarului
author: Michael Schulman
info: A war between people that desire to get what they want and that will help you to learn how they did it

name: Cum sa lucrezi cu (aproape) oricine
author: Michael Bungay Stanier
info: How to get to know and understand almost all the people around you better then they understand themselves

name: Tot ea...Becoming Meryl Streep
author: Michael Schulman
info: How to still be the real you in a world that you need to be the exact oposite

name: Migdala
author: Sohn Won-Pyung
info: The story of the life hardships and how to make them your strenghts

name: Beyond the Story
author: Myeongseok Kang
info: How did they get famous by using two skils: know the public and know what they want

name: Cantecul relevantei
author: Seth Godin
info: The way one is supposed to get through life, by flying right through the obstacles life puts in front of you
